column1: To access the tool, click here

column13: Categories for the Explorer to function. Please ignore:)

column7:
Welcome to the Degrowth Papers Explorer! 
This tool can allow you to filter and search through almost 1500 degrowthy Academic Articles, Reports, Book Chapters, Book Reviews and BSc, MSc or PhD Theses. You can filter by Year(s) Published, Author(s), Publication Type, Language or Topics (of which there are 43!). As this spreadsheet is 'comment-only', we have made a separate sheet where you can use this tool freely. You can also make a copy of the database, giving you your very own explorer. Thank you Brian Ó Fógartaigh for making this tool <3

New entries will be added once a year. Happy reading! :) 

Please share any bugs, feedback or feature requests here! And please send any additions to explore[at]degrowth.net
